Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: MYTHOS landing page with interactive features

- Single-file HTML landing page for MYTHOS Sydney clubbing event
- Split-screen hero with video backgrounds and logo morph animation
- Event details, DJ lineup, VIP booking form, and sponsors sections
- Atmosphere photos integrated into sections with scroll animations
- Video playback speed controls for testing purposes
- Fully responsive design for desktop, tablet, and mobile
- Mediterranean-inspired color palette with terracotta, cream, and gold

Bash(git commit -m "Add Vercel configuration for static site deployment

- Configure Vercel to serve index.html as static site
- Fix Python process error by specifying no build command

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git commit -m "Convert to Next.js application

- Migrate from static HTML to Next.js with TypeScript
- Create App Router structure with app/layout.tsx and app/page.tsx
- Move all static assets (images, videos, branding) to public/ folder
- Extract all CSS to globals.css
- Convert JavaScript to React hooks (useEffect) for client-side interactivity
- Maintain all original functionality (scroll animations, video controls, etc.)
- Configure Next.js for static export with next.config.js
- Update .gitignore for Next.js build artifacts
- Remove old vercel.json (not needed for Next.js)

This enables better performance, SEO, and easier deployment on Vercel.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")
